Malice:
 
The male got off the bed and walked over to Blacknightmare.
"Is there something wrong?  I'm sorry for whatever I might have done."
He took her hand in his and gave it a gentle squeeze.
"I am sorry, Master."

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare::

The femme didn't know what belive, and didn't move or say nothing... 
Storm among her didn't let her think cleary



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Hellplague/ Malice:
>  
> Hellplague finished the installation and checked it.
> "Everything looks good now." she said, getting up.  She pulled the 
connection out of Malice's chest and put the cable and screen back 
in their places.  She walked toward the door and was about to step 
out.
> "See you later." she said, winking at Malice.
>  
> Malice set up on the bed and slammed his chest panel shut.  He 
sweat dropped at the wink from Hellplague, he thought she was trying 
to cause trouble.  He looked up to Blacknightmare, a little nervious.
> "That a few seconds ago, it was all her.  She came onto me, I had 
nothing to do with it.  I couldn't get away."
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> Ideas and feelings was spinning inside the femme as hurricane, 
> altough her outside remained calm, a aparently calm that needed 
all 
> her self-dicipline to remain in that way.
> 
> She acted as if anything had happened... by now.
> 
> "is all ok with our pet, sis?"said cooly the femme
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Malice/ Hellplague:
> >  
> > Malice heard Blacknightmare walk in.  He paniced and pushed 
> Hellplague back and tried to set up.  He succeeded in sitting up, 
a 
> look of confusion and embarressment all over his face.  He tried 
to 
> explain, but ended up red faced and tougue tied.
> >  
> > Hellplague sat up with a satisfied look on her face.  She 
> straightened up and sat up.  She took the sensor from 
Blacknightmare 
> and checked it.  She pushed Malice on his back and set to work 
> replacing the sensor.
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > BlackNightmare:
> > 
> > BlackNightmare arrived at that time and she looked shocke all, 
she 
> > had jealous and rage, but she remember what same had happened 
when 
> > Malice kissed her... It was a wiked way to force a fight among 
> > then??? doubt was raisen until she decides to speak "Err sis, I 
> > found it..."
> > 
> > She need all her control to say that and seem calmed
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
<bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > Malice/ Hellplague:
> > >  
> > > After Blacknightmare left to get the new sensor, Hellplague 
> > reached into Malice's exposed chest.  She drummed her fingers on 
> his 
> > spark chamber.  Malice took a sharp breath, it really freaked 
him 
> > out to have someone touching his spark chamber.  Hellplague 
> giggled 
> > and laid down next Malice.  He looked at her with a mix 
expression 
> > of relief and suprise.
> > > "Please, don't do that.  It feels really weird." he said.
> > > Hellplague grinned and the moved in to kiss him.  As she did, 
> her 
> > hand reurned to drumming on his spark chamber.  Their lips met, 
> and 
> > Malice was motionless.  Hellplague enjoyed the act, and deepened 
> the 
> > kiss.
> >
